name: Rugon - Unfinished
description:
Rugon will not be completed. [/ b]

Rugon is published as unfinished in order to give the existing community that accompanied us on our journey and new players the opportunity to continue playing Rugon. As this does not happen often, we want to reiterate that Rugon is not monetized and ALL GAME CONTENT is available for free.

Become a member of the Discord community! -> https://discord.gg/bqAkawm
